name: S'mores French Toast 🥗
description: Surrender to the irresistible allure of s'mores French toast, where the campfire classic and breakfast favorite collide in a heavenly fusion of flavors. Each decadent bite transports you to a world where gooey marshmallows and melted chocolate reign supreme.
instructions: Whisk eggs, cinnamon, vanilla and milk together in medium-large bowl to create egg wash.
Dunk bread in egg wash then cover in crumbs until evenly coated.
Melt butter in a skillet on medium-low heat and cook bread for 2-3 minutes or until crumbs are crispy and bread is more solid.
Once you flip them over once spread fluff on one slice and melted chocolate on the other.
Garnish with mini marshmallows, mini chocolate chips (optional) and chocolate syrup.
